subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: The two-time overall champion Anna Fenninger will miss the entire World Cup season after seriously injuring her right knee in a training crash in Sölden, Austria, on Wednesday, three days before the start of the Alpine skiing circuit.
snippet: The two-time overall champion Anna Fenninger will miss the entire World Cup season after seriously injuring her right knee in a training crash in Sölden, Austria, on Wednesday, three days before the start of the Alpine skiing circuit.
